disclaimer: This is a web version of [i]Tsukihime[/i], a visual novel published on 2000 by Type-Moon.
The game contains adult content and is intended for mature audiences only.

about.port: This is a web version of [i]Tsukihime[/i], a visual novel published on 2000 by Type-Moon.
about.project: The project is available on %0GitHub%1. Add a star if you like it! Contributions are welcome.
about.feedback: Send your feedback or report a bug %0here%1.
about.data: No data collected, everything is stored in your browser. Manage your data %0here%1.
about.remake: Consider buying the remake %0Tsukihime - A piece of blue glass moon%1.

track-source-help: [b]Original[/b]: Original soundtrack of the complete game from 2000.
[b]Ever After[/b]: Remake of the original soundtrack, published in 2002.
[b]Tsuki-Bako[/b]: Remixed soundtrack that came with a Tsukihime + PLUS-DISC + Kagetsu Tohya package in 2003.
adult-blur-help: Apply a blur effect on the thumbnails of the adult scenes (Save, Load, Flowchart, Gallery, …).
config.adult-warn: Warn me when I enter an H scene
show-locked-content-help: Reveals the complete Gallery, Flowchart, Endings, Eclipse, …
Also fulfills the requirement to access the Far Side.
It can be toggled on and off at any time.
config.data-erase-warning: This will delete all saves, reset all settings and progress. Are you sure?
config.data-erase-confirm: All data have been deleted. If you leave this website without making any change to the settings and without starting a new game, no data will remain stored on your computer

saves.delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete this save?
saves.overwrite-warning: Are you sure you want to overwrite this save?
saves.local-storage-warning: Savefiles and settings are stored locally in the web browser, and might get deleted by the browser after a delay of inactivity. Regularly export your data.

game.skip-viewed: You have already seen this scene.
game.skip-prompt: Do you want to skip it?
game.toast-hscene-waning: You are about to read a scene with mature content.

desc: PLUS-DISC is a fan disc containing a short story and bonus, originally released in 2001.
Note: You should read Tsukihime first.
